text: The Chevrolet Express and GMC Savana are full sized passenger or cargo vans made via General Motors. These vans seat between eight and fifteen passengers. The cargo vans are used for commercial and business purposes. The Express/Savana vans were first produced around 1996. Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Express Category:Vans
title: Chevrolet Express
